snippet: Mr. Trump criticized Hillary Clinton for her desire to “dramatically increase admissions from the Middle East,” and claimed he had warned of the sort of terrorism that marked the shooting.
abstract: Donald J Trump renews call for temporary ban on Muslim migration to United States after gunman professing his loyalty to Islamic State kills 50 people in Orlando nightclub; claims he predicted attack and criticizes stance of Hillary Clinton, who acknowledges need to counter terrorism and reiterates support for gun control.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump criticized Hillary Clinton for her desire to “dramatically increase admissions from the Middle East,” and claimed he had warned of the sort of terrorism that marked the shooting.

headline.main: Donald Trump Seizes on Orlando Shooting and Repeats Call for Temporary Ban on Muslim Migration
headline.print_headline: Trump Seizes on Massacre and Repeats Call for Ban on Muslim Migration
